name: THiRD CULTURE KiDS
description:
Two people on one night recreated from their childhoods.

A boy alone in the woods with a knife. A girl with one eye barricading her bedroom door shut. Two parallel, interwoven stories of 'Third Culture'. 

"ugly shots can be fired behind closed doors, but open ones let the dark in"

A story based exploration game set on one night in an English village in the 1980s.

Third culture is an outsider state, a state of not belonging, where there is no single reality to tether oneself to. A superpower which comes at a price.

Compatible with Xbox Controller or keyboard

#adventure #walkingsimulator #environmentalnarrativegame #firstperson #artgame #narrative

Keyboard Controls
W / A / S / D + Cursor Controls
Q / E / B to Interact [prompted]
SPACE to Jump

Minimum Specs

Window 10 64bit
Core i5 7th gen
NVIDIA GTX1060
8Gb RAM
